content.rendered:
PRODUCT INFORMATION
Manufacturer Biolight Meditech
In The Package Yellow M70 Fingertip Pulse Oximeter, 2 AAA Batteries, Necklace/Lanyard Strap, Printed Instructions
Part Number(s) HCSM70
HCPCS Insurance Code E0445
Manufacturer’s Warranty 1 Year
Warranty Notes: Warranty applies to primary item. Accessory and parts warranties may vary. Review manufacturer’s documentation for full details.

 

PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Available Color(s) Yellow & Gray
Size (Approx) 50 x 33 x 30 Millimeters
Weight (Approx) 55 Grams (with batteries)
Display Type Color OLED

 

OXIMETER SPECIFICATIONS
Display Parameters SpO2 Pulse Rate, Pulse Intensity Bar Graph, Battery Capacity Indicator, Pleth Waveform
Pulse Rate Display 25 to 250 BPM (Beats Per Minute)
Pulse Rate Accuracy ± 1% or ± 1 BPM whichever is greater
SpO2 Range Display 0 to 100% Oxygen Saturation
SpO2 Accuracy 70 to 100% ± 2% (Unspecified under 70%)

 

BATTERY SPECIFICATIONS
Battery Type 2 AAA Batteries (Included)
Battery Run Time (Avg) 24 Hours of Continuous Working Time

M700 Handhold Pulse Oximeter

The M700 Handheld Pulse Oximeter features a light-weight, compact design for easy carrying and handling. It is equipped with a bright, easy-to-read LED display and audible indicators. The M700 also features advanced digital processing technology, that helps to ensure reliable readings even during low perfusion.

  • User-friendly design
  • Bright, easy-to-read LED display
  • Reliable readings during low perfusion
  • Suitable for adult, pediatric & neonatal patients
  • Convenient AA size alkaline or rechargable

PART NUMBERS

  • M700R123P16
  • Adult Reusable Finger SensorR123P22-001
  • Pediatric Reusable Finger SensorR123P22-002
  • Neonatal Reusable Finger SensorR123P22-003
  • Adult Reusable Soft Finger SensorR123P23-002
  • Pediatric Reusable Soft Finger SensorR123P23-002
  • Reusable Ear Clip SensorR123P24-001
  • SpO2 Extension Cable (9-pin)R123P25
  • Veterinary Reusable SensorR123P26

excerpt.rendered:
The attractive M70 Fingertip Pulse Oximeter is simple to use with an adaptable display, a convenient neck strap (lanyard) for hands free storage, an automatic power-off feature, and a long battery life. Designed for reliability, accuracy and durability; M70 is a great oximeter solution for people on the go who want access to immediate, real-time spot-checks.

The M70 Deluxe is an integrated all-in-one unit that provides accurate, simple measurements to give you peace of mind that your oxygen levels are safe during rest and activity. The M70 Fingertip Pulse Oximeter is intended for non-invasive spot-check measurement of oxygen saturation of arterial hemoglobin (SpO2).
